citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee's (IACUC) July 2024 report of the conducted semi-annual evaluations
of the program and the facility inspection was incomplete. The report was not reviewed or signed by a majority of the
IACUC members. The report was also not submitted to the Institutional Official of the research facility.
Review and signature by members ensures accountability for the contents of the report by the IACUC. The report formally
details the IACUC's evaluation of the facility and animal care and use program to ensure that the Institutional Official is
aware of any deficiencies and plans for corrections.
Reports must be updated at least once every six months upon completion of the required semi-annual evaluations and
must be made available to APHIS for inspection upon request. The facility must ensure that semi-annual reports are
reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC. Reports to the Institutional Official must be updated at least once every
six months upon completion of the required semi-annual evaluations.
Correct by July 15, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
